abstract: Bank of America‘s chief executive, Kenneth D. Lewis, is joining the growing ranks of top banking executives who are giving up their annual bonuses after a dreadful year in the financial industry.
lead_paragraph: Bank of America‘s chief executive, Kenneth D. Lewis, is joining the growing ranks of top banking executives who are giving up their annual bonuses after a dreadful year in the financial industry.

headline.main: Bank of America’s Chief Offers to Give Up Bonus
